title: How to unsubscribe from Peloton App
description: Learn how to cancel your Peloton App subscription through the website, app stores, or connected devices. Follow our step-by-step guide to manage your membership and avoid unwanted charges.

web.title: Cancel Peloton Membership via Website
web.description:
To cancel your Peloton membership via the website:

*   Go to the Peloton website and log in to your account.
*   Navigate to 'My Account' and then 'Subscriptions'. Alternatively, go to Account > Membership or visit your membership page.
*   Click 'Manage Membership'.
*   Select the option to cancel or suspend your membership.
*   Follow the on-screen prompts to confirm your cancellation.
*   Check your email (including the spam folder) for a confirmation email.

app_ios.title: Cancel Peloton Membership via Apple App Store (iOS)
app_ios.description:
To cancel your Peloton membership via the Apple App Store (iOS):

*   Open the Settings app.
*   Tap your name.
*   Tap 'Subscriptions'.
*   Select 'Peloton'.
*   Tap 'Cancel Subscription'.

app_android.title: Cancel Peloton Membership via Google Play Store (Android)
app_android.description:
To cancel your Peloton membership via the Google Play Store (Android):

*   Open the Google Play Store app.
*   Tap your profile icon.
*   Tap 'Payments & subscriptions' > 'Subscriptions'.
*   Choose 'Peloton'.
*   Tap 'Cancel Subscription'.
